title: Katie Pavlich Slams ‘Egregious’ 60 Minutes Report On Ron DeSantis
summary:
Listen To The Full Interview Below:Katie Pavlich, Editor for Townhall.com & Fox News Contributor joined Fox News Radio’s Guy Benson Show to give her take on the backlash against CBS News’s 60 minutes report on Florida Governor Ron DeSantis.
Katie Pavlich said,“Well, my take away on the media angle is that they’ve just, you know, 60 Minutes has proven repeatedly now, and especially with this standing by, this egregious, totally false report that even Democrats in Florida are saying is incorrect and that they did it on purpose to smear the governor is a smear machine, that their a leftist activist, you know, organization that wants to take out Republicans they see as a threat.”
paragraphs: Listen To The Full Interview Below:

Katie Pavlich, Editor for Townhall.com & Fox News Contributor joined Fox News Radio’s Guy Benson Show to give her take on the backlash against CBS News’s 60 minutes report on Florida Governor Ron DeSantis.

“Well, my take away on the media angle is that they’ve just, you know, 60 Minutes has proven repeatedly now, and especially with this standing by, this egregious, totally false report that even Democrats in Florida are saying is incorrect and that they did it on purpose to smear the governor is a smear machine, that their a leftist activist, you know, organization that wants to take out Republicans they see as a threat.”
